subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kris Versteeg beat Carolina’s Cam Ward in the fourth round of a shootout in a 3-2 victory for the Chicago Blackhawks, who ended the Hurricanes’ winning streak at four games.
snippet: Kris Versteeg beat Carolina’s Cam Ward in the fourth round of a shootout in a 3-2 victory for the Chicago Blackhawks, who ended the Hurricanes’ winning streak at four games.
